rdf:Description.dc:title: Guidelines for industrial landfills 1987
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Environmental Protection Services.
Alberta. Alberta Environment. Standards and Approvals Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Environmental Protection Services, Alberta Environment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Approval to establish new industrial landfills or to continue operating existing industrial landfills is required from the Director of Standards and Approvals, Alberta Environment" -- introd.
AGL*Superceded by "Standards for landfills in Alberta draft" TD 795.7 S786 2007.
